titleStmt.title: A nevv discourse of a stale subiect, called the metamorphosis of Aiax: vvritten by Misacmos, to his friend and cosin Philostilpnos
titleStmt.author: Harington, John, Sir, 1560-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Field [and Eliot's Court Press], dwelling in the Black-friers,

notesStmt.note: Identification of Eliot's Court Press from STC.
Running title reads: The metamorphosis of Aiax.
Identified as STC 12779 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
